CustomField.description: As part of DCP-1298 for Clinical Type Information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When applicable, indicates nature of entity's work within the clinical space; value defaulted from Ultimate Consignee, but can be opportunity-specific and adjusted if needed. Required throughout opportunity lifecycle. Terms and regional use: "Clinical" (All); "Non Clinical" (All); "Healthcare Prime" (AMR); "IVD Partner" (GC); "Platform Distributor" (GC).
CustomField.label: Clinical Type
